When I get home

# BITSY VERSION 3.5

! ROOM_FORMAT 1

ROOM 0

DLG M
Zzzz... Looks like Mary-Margaret is napping on the sofa.

DLG C
I'MMA BITE UR TOES UNLESS U FEED ME RIGHT MEOW

DLG T
There's not much tea left...    and it's cold.

DLG B
It's a book about pollinators.
